sentences.en: Butchery: Will now always grant 20 runic power, regardless of the creature type killed.
sentences.cn: 杀戮: 总是给予20点符文能量, 不管杀死的是什么生物类型.

sentences.en: Cost increased to 60 runic power, up from 50.
Frost Strike ( Tier 9 ) now costs 40 runic power, down from 50.
sentences.cn: 冰霜打击 ( 第9层 ) 技能消耗从50点符文能量减少到40点.

sentences.en: Glyph of Icebound Fortitude - Your Icebound Fortitude costs no runic power.
sentences.cn: 冰封之韧(IceboundFortitude)不再消耗符文能量.

sentences.en: Glyph of Icy Touch - Your Icy Touch does 10 % less damage but generate 10 additional runic power.
sentences.cn: 冰触(IcyTouch)伤害降低10%,但是会额外获得10符文能量.

sentences.en: Glyph of Icy Touch - Your Icy Touch does 10 % less damage but generates 10 additional runic power.
sentences.cn: 冰霜触摸铭文 - 你的冰霜触摸伤害减少10%,但是增加10点符文能量获取.

sentences.en: Golden Spellthread and Runic Spellthread have been slightly improved.
sentences.cn: 黄金魔法线和符文魔法线被略微加强了.

sentences.en: The meaning of some runic forms is not always well understood today.
sentences.cn: 有些北欧古代文字形式的意义在今天并非都能理解清楚。

words.tran_cn: 诗歌；古代北欧文字；神秘的记号
